sub_title: Experienced semiconductor reliability practitioner, specializing in new product, process, and materials qualification
summary: Experienced Reliability Engineering practitioner with a demonstrated history of working in the semiconductors industry. Strong engineering professional skilled in Reliability Engineering, Microelectronics, Integrated Circuits (IC), Quality Assurance, and Semiconductor Industry.

certifications.name: Certified Materials Engineer
certifications.authority: Institute of Materials Engineers of the Philippines

certifications.name: ASQ Certified Six Sigma Green Belt

profile_positions.description:
• ASQ certified Six Sigma Greenbelt
• Leads and supervises a reliability engineering group composed of engineers and project planners at the Philippine campus supporting ADI's manufacturing change requirements and technical review board
• Leads qualification activities on package development, and special marrket release: automotive, aerospace and enhanced products
• Works with various cross-functional teams in ways towards improved product reliability
• Reviews and releases reliability reports on qualified products and processes
• Hires and supervises engineers and technicians as needed to support the worldwide reliability operations and engineering group
profile_positions.title: Reliability Engineering Section Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Leads and supervises the reliability engineering group at the Philippine campus supporting ADI's North America and Ireland sites
• Leads and supervises the device ESD and Latch-up Testing group
• Advices various engineering and production group on ways towards improved product reliability
• Supports worldwide manufacturing in qualification of new products, assembly sites and processes
• Coordinates with various engineering teams in the closure of quality issues
• Coordinates with Failure Analysis Group to identify failure modes and mechanisms and develop countermeasures
• Creates and releases qualification plans and coordinate qualification of fab and assembly site transfers and new product releases
• Reviews and releases reliability reports on qualified products and processes
• Hires and supervises engineers and technicians as needed to support the worldwide reliability operations and engineering group
profile_positions.title: Senior Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
o	In-charge of factory level changes qualifications for discrete and integrated circuits products
o	Supports customers in terms of reliability testing and failure verifications
o	Coordinates with Failure Analysis Group to identify failure modes and mechanisms and develop countermeasures
o	Performs qualifications and assessments for customer lot acceptance requirements
o	Coordinates with various engineering teams in the closure of quality issues
o	Releases reliability reports, data analysis and documentation of completed qualifications
o	Works with the Quality Assurance Department in providing answers to customer inquiries related to product quality performance
o	Maintains and helps drive down closure cycle time of corrective action requests in the occurece of quality hits
o	Advices various engineering and production group on ways towards improved product reliability
profile_positions.title: Senior Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Acted as laboratory operations supervisor
• Perform reliability assessment of new products and processes
• Create qual plans and coordinate qualification of fab and assembly site transfers
• Support customers in terms of reliability testing and failure verifications
• Coordinate with Failure Analysis Group to identify failure modes and mechanisms and develop countermeasures
• Collaborate with Ireland- and US-side counterparts on the qualification activities of wafer fab transfer activities
• Support worldwide manufacturing in qualification of new products and processes
• Perform qualifications and assessments for customer lot acceptance requirements
• Coordinate with various engineering teams in the closure of quality issues
• Release reliability reports on qualified products and processes
• Support local and off-shore groups in various quality related activities
• Created Reliability Engineering training module for newly hired engineers
• In-charge of group  5S and safety
profile_positions.title: Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Conducts evaluations of newly approved parts and parts improvement prior to use in mass-production to determine suitability for use in Toshiba Philippine plant
• Conducts new parts qualification evaluation and audit prior to 4M approval
• Conducts regular audit of local and overseas parts suppliers to check compliance to Toshiba and ISO90001:2000 standards
• Performs failure analysis of failed drives to determine root cause and recommend actions to improve the pass rate or correct the root cause
• Implementation of various Work Instructions from parent factory in Japan to improve process capability and quality
• Conducts regular quality meeting with spindle motor and mechanical parts suppliers to tackle quality issues and discuss current parts performance at Toshiba line
• Performs HDD quality trend monitoring in relation to possible parts related defects
• Conducts training of new engineers regarding HDD technology, parts technology, ISO9001:2000 and basic statistical process control
• Collaborate with IQC Group in verification of incoming parts reject and manufacturing line feedback and with OQC Group regarding parts related customer claims
• Conducts Internal Quality Audit as a certified ISO9001 internal auditor of other Toshiba business units
• Collaborate with Toshiba Japanese support in projects to improve pass rate and parts quality
• Coordinate with other Toshiba subsidiaries in tackling quality issues encountered with other factories
profile_positions.title: Parts and Supplier Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Performed pass rate monitoring to determine which particular model or process has low yield and check for root cause of low pass rate
• Performed failure analysis of failed drives
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Conducted data gathering for SPC data of grid casting process
• Performed sample preparation and metallurgical microscopy of lead-acid battery grids
• Prepared manufacturing parameter specifications for different lead grid casting processes
profile_positions.title: Technical Intern
